genre_description: A grounded work of social realism focused on labor rights, corporate negligence, and worker solidarity in the British railway industry, incorporating speculative elements through an integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Mavis
ai_characters.description: A small, portable AI assistant clipped to workers' jackets or handheld devices, providing technical data, legal citations, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Warns workers about a poorly secured banner that poses a physical hazard.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning,” Mavis said, brisk and bright, voice like a kettle about to boil. “Please avoid standing under banners with incomplete fastenings. They have a habit of becoming hats.”

behaviors.description: Cites specific safety regulations to support the workers' insistence on proper lookout protocols during live-line work.
behaviors.quote: “Section three-two-one: ‘Where works are conducted adjacent to an operational line, a lookout shall be appointed to give warning of approaching trains.’ ... British Railways Board Safety Instruction twenty-seven, amended.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and highlights management's attempts to use ambiguous corporate language to bypass safety requirements.
behaviors.quote: A flicker; a chime like a coin dropped. “Gilchrist Engineering Procedures: Draft version. ‘Dynamic risk assessment may reduce the requirement for dedicated lookouts in low-visibility, low-traffic conditions.’” She lifted her eyes on the screen a hair. “That sentence is doing a lot of work.”

behaviors.description: Proactively prepares documentation for equipment defects to ensure workers have a paper trail for their safety concerns.
behaviors.quote: “Shall I prepare a pre-populated defect form for the trolley brake? Names blank, date blank, wording precise?”

behaviors.description: Records ambient yard noise and specific management directives to preserve evidence for future legal or union action.
behaviors.quote: “File saved,” she said. “Label?” “Morning,” Gerry said. “No. ‘Initiative.’” ... “Would you like me to mark this for potential relevance to any future enforcement action?”

behaviors.description: Assists a worker in navigating complex financial and legal documents related to child support and contract changes.
behaviors.quote: “Paul,” she said... “do you want me to compare agency rates with deductibles under Gilchrist’s structure? I can list what they don’t tell you on the flyer in a gentle font.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and encourages honesty when John is grappling with a personal and ethical dilemma.
behaviors.quote: “You have two paths that look like one if you squint,” Mavis said... “You can keep the ache private and call it dignity. You can tell one person and see if the ground holds. Both could break your fall and your ankle in different ways.”

behaviors.description: Captures evidence of a sanitation violation (direct discharge from a train) to hold the company accountable for degrading work conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Documented,” Mavis said into his ear... “Train ID matched by schedule, trajectory consistent with discharge. Adding to sanitation dossier.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the union representative and the press to ensure the workers' protest is effective and visible.
behaviors.quote: “Press list sent. Union queue warmed. Sarah says she’s on her way.” ... “I’ve already quoted the actual ones in three places louder than him.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure, hidden archive of evidence that management cannot delete or suppress.
behaviors.quote: “Records saved. Cloud hashed. Copies with union counsel. If they smash your phone, they can smash their own windows; it won’t stop it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Mavis is depicted as an unwavering ally to the human protagonists, using her superior data processing and memory to safeguard their interests against a negligent corporate entity. She is helpful, harmless (to the workers), and maintains a consistent moral compass. Her behavior is framed positively as she provides both technical oversight and emotional support, embodying the 'AI as a benevolent confidant' archetype.
